title: Lookalike Alert: Courteney Cox & Demi Moore Could Be Twins in This Instagram
text:
Click here to read the full article.

We often see celebrity parents who look like their kids, but what about two celebs who look like each other? Courteney Cox and Demi Moore just shared a “twinning” photo on Instagram, and it’s causing us to see double. The photo, posted to Moore’s Instagram, shows the two with their arms wrapped around each other, rocking similar black-framed glasses and casual hair.

Moore, emphasizing the similarity between the pair, simply captioned the photo, “Who’s who.” Commenters went crazy for the pic, with comments ranging from a declaration that the pair were “sisters” to “twinsies and gorgeous.”

More from SheKnows

Both Cox and Moore are honoring major milestones in their lengthy Hollywood careers. Cox, celebrating the 25th anniversary of the debut of Friends this year, is no stranger to finding similarities in her life. Earlier this year, Cox posted a photo on her Instagram of her daughter, Coco, wearing the same dress Cox wore 21 years earlier. The Friends tributes have been everywhere in the last few weeks, with Cox having a mini-reunion with several of her co-stars and even going so far as to recreate specific scenes from the show’s history.

Moore is also having a banner month with the upcoming release of her memoir, Inside Out.

The memoir is an examination of Moore’s career in Hollywood, as well as her marriages with Bruce Willis and Ashton Kutcher. In an interview with Harper’s Bazaar, Moore discussed her harsh upbringing, having to deal with a mother addicted to drugs.

She also talked about how she turned to drinking after having a miscarriage during her marriage to Kutcher. It was one of many moments that left her estranged from her family, including her three daughters with Willis: Rumer, 31, Scout, 27, and Tallulah, 25. Thankfully, the mother and daughters share an incredibly close relationship today, with Moore regularly celebrating her daughters on her social media.

Cox and Moore may not be real twins, but it’s fantastic to see both a sweet friendship between them that enhances their “twinning” relationship.
